## Vulnerability Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the security vulnerability.

**Please do not include sensitive information in this public template. Use the private security reporting process instead.**

## Impact
Describe the potential impact of this vulnerability:
- What could an attacker do?
- What data could be compromised?
- What systems could be affected?

## Steps to Reproduce (High-level)
Provide a high-level overview of how to reproduce the vulnerability. Do not include detailed exploitation steps in this public template.

## Affected Versions
Which versions of the application are affected?

## Mitigation
If you know of any workarounds or mitigations, please describe them here.

## Additional Information
Any additional information that might help our security team assess and fix this vulnerability.
